overview:
Laura has an academic background in business administration. She studied at the University of Fribourg, holds an M.B.A., and completed her post-master management studies at SDA Bocconi (Milan). She is an experienced management consultant with a special focus on the financial services industry (b&m management and PricewaterhouseCoopers). She worked with several banks helping them to define their strategy and operating models, developed business plans and introduced efficiency measures. Besides her consulting work, she researched and analyzed performance drivers of private banks and is a trained Lean Six Sigma Green Belt. Laura started her carrier in a luxury industry company (Bally) where she conducted strategic market research and competitor analysis.

Laura enjoys continuous challenges - at work and in the world of sports.

At present, Laura is Managing Partner of Verve Capital Partners (Zurich).
